# Declare Variables to extract data fro Day 80 of 500

```{r}
title <- "Day 80 of 500: Phase 1 - Route 8 (6km -> 4mi)"
date <- "6-Feb-2024"
start_time <- "05:56"
end_time <- "06:23"
description <- "Set a new world record in 1500m by December 31, 2024"
heart_points = 52
steps = 4593
comment = "You stepped it up a gear!"
active_time_hr = "0:27:17"
distance_km = 6.89
energy_expended_cal = 406
move_minutes = 26
average_pace_per_km = "0:03:56"
```

# Display the value of each variable
```{r}
cat("Title:", title, "\n")
cat("Date:", date, "\n")
cat("Start time:", start_time, "\n")
cat("End time:", end_time, "\n")
cat("Description:", description, "\n")
cat("Heart points:", heart_points, "\n")
cat("Steps:", steps, "\n")
cat("Comment:", comment, "\n")
cat("Active time:", active_time_hr, "\n")
cat("Distance (Km):", distance_km, "\n")
cat("Energy expended (cal):", energy_expended_cal, "\n")
cat("Move Minutes:", move_minutes, "\n")
cat("Average Pace Per Km:", average_pace_per_km, "\n")
```
